texts.name: Craig Hill
texts.biography: Craig Hill used to be a fighter in Krewlod. After experienced a long period sojourn, he became increasingly like a barbarian. Although he has already backed home, he cannot find the original feeling as a dwarf.

specialty.description:
{Gladiators and Flame Gladiators}

Increases Speed of any Gladiators and Flame Gladiators by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Gladiators
